name: Trafic and road signs
description: USA traffic and road signs packed in an interesting game. Learning through game is the way to go-especially on your phone!  Perfect educational tool for students and driving test takers, as well as for experienced drivers who need knowledge refresher. If you are preparing for school competition or driving test, check your knowledge with this quick quiz, and compare results with others.  Review and explanation of traffic signs in USA, Mexico, Brasil, Chile, Argentina, Colombia, Canada (Quebec) and links for 47 more countries world wide. Two type of tests.
